industry: Retail Apparel and Fashion and Fashion Accessories Manufacturing
description:
Sales Buying Assistant - Fashion Brand
Location: Commerce, CA 90040
Type: Contract-to-Hire
Hours: Monday - Friday
Rate: up to $22 per hour

About the Role:
Our client, a leading fashion brand known for its trendy and contemporary clothing for young women, is seeking a dynamic Sales Buying Assistant to join their team. The Sales Buying Assistant will play a key role in supporting the sales/buying team and ensuring an exceptional customer experience.

Key Responsibilities:
  • Provide outstanding customer service to both customers and prospects, addressing inquiries and resolving issues promptly.
  • Assist the sales team with various customer service tasks to facilitate smooth operations.
  • Create and maintain detailed records of line sheets based on buyer selections.
  • Take notes during sales meetings to ensure accurate documentation and follow-up.
  • Collaborate with design and production teams to support product development and fulfillment.
  • Coordinate the sending of fabric swatches and garment sample pictures to factories.

Qualifications:
  • College educated - ideally in fashion, merchandising, buying or product development
  • FIDM GRADS would be a plus!
  • Understanding of garment bodies and fashion trends
  • Basic understanding of retail metrics and terms
  • Strong written and verbal communication skills.
  • Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, Outlook).
  • Knowledge of the clothing industry, particularly Kids, Junior Dresses, and Sportswear.
  • Retail experience is a plus.
  • Ability to multitask and thrive under pressure in a fast-paced environment.
  • Capability to work independently as well as collaboratively within a team.
  • Successful completion of drug and background checks required prior to starting.
